definition: mountain resort/Qing imperial summer residence at Chengde, a world heritage site
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
heat/hot weather/summer heat
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
surname Zhuang

sentences.english: The Summer Resort is vast and magnificent, which reflects the broad-minded ideals of Emperor Kangxi and Emperor Qianlong.
sentences.chinese: 避暑山莊園林宏偉闊大，體現了康乾兩帝的寬闊胸懷。

sentences.english: Yanyun Building is oneof main sites in the Chende Loyal Summer Resort.
sentences.chinese: 煙雨樓煙雨樓是避暑山莊的主要景觀之一。

sentences.english: In summer, there are many people who come from the different area in the world to visit Summering Manor.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天，有來自世界各地的旅行者參觀避暑山莊。

sentences.english: There has a lot of hot spots in China, such as Hai Nan, Chen De mountain resort and so on.
sentences.chinese: 在中國有許多景點，諸如海南，成德避暑山莊等等。

sentences.english: In the time of Qianlong, the vegetation in Chengde was extremely good, and pines reached high up to the sky, blotting out the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 乾隆時期承德植被極好，參天蔽日的樹環繞避暑山莊。

definition: Luanping county in Chengde 承德[Cheng2 de2], Hebei

literary inquisition/official persecution of intellectuals for their writing
to give audience (of emperor)/retainers' duty to pay respect to sovereign/hajj (Islam)

the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
